item.title: update-alternatives与JAVA_HOME
item.description: 测试 /etc/profile配置 export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-7-openjdk-amd64 export CLASSPATH=.:$JAVA_HOME/lib/dt.jar:$JAVA_HOME/lib/tools.jar export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin 使用update-alternatives切换JAVA hadoop@note50064:~$ which java /usr/bin/java hadoop@note50064:~$ sudo update-alternatives --config java There are 2 choices for the alternative . Selection Path Priority Status ------------------------------------------------------------ 0 /usr/lib/jvm/java-7-oracle/jre/bin/java 1072 auto mode * 1 /usr/lib/jvm/java-7-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java 1071 manual mode 2 /usr/lib/jvm/java-7-oracle/jre/bin/java 1072 manual mode Press enter to keep the current choice[*], or type selection number: hadoop@note50064:~$ ls -l /usr/bin/java lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 22 Nov 21 03:26 /usr/bin/java -> /etc/alternatives/java hadoop@note50064:~$ ls -l /etc/alternatives/java lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 46 Nov 1 01:44 /etc/alternatives/java -> /usr/lib/jvm/java-7-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java hadoop@note50064:~$ java -version java version "1.
